subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Ángel Cabrera’s victory in the United States Open on Sunday attracted an average of 9.5 million viewers, the most since Tiger Woods’s victory in 2002.
snippet: Ángel Cabrera’s victory in the United States Open on Sunday attracted an average of 9.5 million viewers, the most since Tiger Woods’s victory in 2002.
